      public boolean drawTilesFromBoard(int x, int y, int amount, Board.Direction direction)
      this method is used to send the command to the server to draw the tiles from the board
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate on the board
      y - y coordinate on the board
      amount - amount of tiles to draw
      direction - direction in which to draw the tiles
      Returns:
      the list of drawn tiles if the operation didn't contain any errors, null otherwise

    • getMyShelf

      public Tile[][] getMyShelf()
      this method is used to get the shelf of the player from the server rmi
      Returns:
      a matrix of tiles representing the shelf of the requesting player, null if there are problems in contacting the server or if the name of the player is not one of the players in the game

      player - name of the opponent player
      Returns:
      a matrix of tiles representing the shelf of the requesting player, null if there are problems in contacting the server or if the name of the player is not one of the players in the game
